Civic Entrepreneurship with Derek Eder 💻👔⚖️

Oct 11, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • chihacknight
  • chicago

Episode 20! This time we feature a conversation with Derek Eder, Founder of both DataMade, a civic tech focused company and Chi Hack Night, a civic tech volunteer organization in Chicago. We talk through what it’s like to engage in civic entrepreneurship.
